description_html: 'Nester' lounge incorporates a variety of postures and provides comfort in the workplace with the addition of a single new couch option. Its inspiring design offers sitting, standing and lounge options in one collection, so your team can do more with one simple workstation solution. The Nester Desk lounge is the new addition to the G-Series Workstations. Developed for creative, collaborative environments where flexibility is demanded. Nester is a built-in desk/sofa designed to offset the rhythm open office floor plan. Creative teams can stay focused and engaged whether, sitting, standing, or relaxing at work.
